name: Stepper
description: Step-by-step progress indicator for multi-step processes with optional linear enforcement

accessibility.screenReader: Uses role=list with accessible label describing the progress steps. Each step item is a list item with active step indicated by aria-current=step. Completed and pending states are conveyed through data attributes.

recommendedUsage: Use for multi-step forms, wizards, or onboarding flows. Use linear mode when steps must be completed in order. Provide clear titles and optional descriptions for each step.
antiPatterns: Do not use for simple progress - use Progress instead. Avoid too many steps (more than 7). Do not use for non-sequential processes.
